caption: Otis is a gem hidden deep in Williamsburg. A must try if you're in the area 👌🏽
Great food!

we went on thurs mar 25th. amazing music! esp. for those who like upbeat ambiance.  and then the food killed us. the creamy mussels are delicious, their bread is too good, and the lamb shack was ok. overall loced the place. great service too.
Food amazing drinks amazing vibes amazing

great local spot. I lived in Bushwick for years and frequented this place for food and drinks. The staff are all friendly and helpful, the food is amazing, and the aesthetics are perfect. Can't ask for more in my opinion. Love Otis!!1
The salad burrata is amazing!

Indoor and Outdoor seating available, I recommend putting in a reservation. We are lucky to always be able to snag a table for two without reservations. It’s our favorite date night go to in the neighborhood. Best Burrata, I’ve ever had, & can’t go wrong on the rotations main dishes and deserts: Always a win. Love this place
Great music, vibes, food and drinks at this Bishwick spot. Highly recommend the espresso martini, mussels and pork shoulder pasta.
House bread Burrata Pork shoulder pasta Berry crumble (WOW)  Great service great food!

We came here to get dessert but really want to come back for the entrees, the menu looks amazing! We ordered the berry crumble (berry compote with delicious salty, sweet crumble) and the dark chocolate cake with cacao nibs and espresso ice cream. The desserts were decadent and delicious, and highly recommend!
Have a hard time ordering anything but the braised pork shoulder ragu . Incredible dish and such friendly staff.
Great vibes, perfect service and amazing food!
Good food, nice atmosphere, wonderful service!
Food here is always awesome. But a friend recommended I order the white wine reduction butter sauce to add to the fajitas, and it was fantastic. Highly highly recommended!!
I walked into this restaurant because I needed to go to the bathroom so bad lol All of the menu we ordered was so good I forgot to take food pictures... Definitely coming back here for more!  ❤️
Very good food and excellent service

Incredibly delicious dishes with complex flavor profiles. Makes for an elegant meal! We tried to sit in the cute outdoor patio but it was too cold and windy so we took it to go. So worth it! I will say it’s heavy food, so eat light leading up to this meal. You wanna be able to squeeze it all in! The stewed beef and the burrata are perfection.
The food was amazing with good portions. Plus the wait staff were exceptional.  The burrata is to die for. Get one order per two people!
Great food, service and atmosphere
Amazing food and drink. Run by lovely people.

Its a little pricey, but everyone here is really sweet and its a great atmosphere. I went with a friend and after we finished our food (which was delicious, and the portions were larger than I was expecting) and closing out we went to the front to sit and crochet. Someone brought us hot water and lemon wedges which was just so nice and appreciated.
Fantastic food, warm staff, and safe environment. A gem!
Favorite brunch spot in the city! Always delicious and wonderful service.
Great ambience and super attentive service. The meals were fresh and yummy. Will definitely recommend this place to friends. Affordable prices and big meals. Good job.
(Translated by Google) 3 favorite elevator  (Original) 3 ascensor favorito
Absolutely fantastic!

Amazing dinner, especially the very original burrata. Rhythm of arrival of cocktails, appetizers and entrees was perfect. Last but not least the quantity is very decent, we left the restaurant with doggy bags and will enjoy the rest of our meals later this week.

First, there's no excuse not to go, it's steps from the L train.  But it would be worth a five mile hike uphill to get there.  From start to finish - OUTSTANDING.  And this is from someone who "worked in food" for 35 years.  In other words, I have a picky palate.  Our server, Aaron is a consummate professional. Truly TOP NOTCH. GO go go!  (Seating is ideally spaced for COVID safety)
Delicious, beautiful setting, great staff
The most exquisite food & cocktails. Who is this dexterous chef and who is this mixologist? Really friendly efficient waitstaff.

What a scrumptious brunch in a lovely backyard on a crisp and sunny autumn day! Otis has been on my list for a year or so and I am extremely happy that I finally checked it out. Although I was more interested in the dishes on the dinner menu, I had to say all the brunch dishes exceeded my expectation! The burrata was such a pleasant and artistic dish, sweet, savory, tart, creamy and also starchy. The profile is so complex and sophisticated to make every single bite enjoyable. The beef hash presented lots of Asian flavors, from the ingredients to the spice. I like that the beef was cooked with kabocha squash. The potato pancake at the bottom was crispy outside and leveled up with the tomato sauce. You would think the mushroom was the spotlight of the wild mushroom toast, but it would not be that splendid without the smashed and flavored avocado in between and the grated grana panado on top. I wish the warm weather can last a bit longer or indoor dining opened up so I can go back to have dinner. I heard the dinner menu is calling me back!

Seriously good food. Super cute outdoor vibes. The ground is all covered in gravel in the outdoor dining area which actually on the side of the restaurant. I believe they also have a sidewalk dining in addition to Indoor but I didn’t get to see any of those. Every single dish we had was absolutely superb, fresh ingredients and monumental preparation. The team is amazing, like so hospitable and chill. Love them for being so accommodating and knowledgeable. I love the lounge bar all the way in the back of the backyard, will be back!!!

Date night with my wife. The food was excellent. The staff was so attentive. There were extremely busy and there was wait due to Covid-19 restrictions and never did we feel like we were neglected. The food was even better that the feeling Otis gave me as a patron. I will definitely be back.
Fantastic food at this Bushwick gem, and stellar outdoor setting.
Amazing food and strong drinks. The burrata is amazing!!!! Will return again.
Ron did a great job showing me my new mattress and allow to get my pc richards credit card. Very satisfied with the queality and price.

This is becoming my favorite restaurant. I’ve found a gem!  The food, the service, the drinks, the ambiance! Nothing less than extraordinary.  Their mussels are to literally DIE for.  Can’t wait to go back yet again!
Oh my gawwwd. Guys, you must go here and eat every single thing on the menu and make sure to try the muscles. It's heaven on a plate. Great service, decor and vibes. Go NOW!
Excellent!

Otis is by far my favorite place to in Brooklyn. Whether it's a Wednesday night dinner and drinks or a Saturday night our, bringing folks from out of town. The food is next level -- you have to get the burrata and the pork shoulder pasta!
We came late, but they still sat us, we ordered food quickly and had last call round of drinks. Cute outside area, burrata was amazing!!! And drinks were good!
Great service, delicious food, slightly pricey, they should give a bit more bread with the spread dishes. Would definitely recommend.
Ambiance was amazing....food was also very good but very pricey....drinks were good 👍
Love love love. This is our special date place in Bushwick. They deliver as well. Worth every penny.  Very safe with CoVID as well. Sanitary and following recommendations.

I went to Otis for the first time for my birthday in 2019 - which has become a tradition. I am completely fascinated by the burrata and the pork shoulder pasta, trust me, that's the best pasta you'll have in your life. The wines by the glass, cocktails (A+ for the old fashioned) and staff are amazing too!
The food in this place is amazing!!! The service was also really good: Suprit is so nice!! I would definitively go back.
The food and service were beyond my expectations. We really loved the ambience of this spot. Excellent spot to take my family out for lunch.
Absolute best!! Food was delicious, fun atmosphere, great music. Both food and drinks were delicious and Marco the manager is amazing! Must go!

So impressed - super fast delivery via Caviar, duck was still steaming when it arrived, everything was delicious, and they sent a sweet handwritten note of thanks for the support. I wanted to treat myself during quarantine and this made me super happy. Thank you so much!!
Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Place has a very nice looking interior and good vibe all around.
Nice vibe. Great cocktails and friendly staff.
Gem of a restaurant. Truely professional wait staff. Excellent menu. Imaginative dishes. Phenomenal cocktails. I wish we had been coming here for ages rather than just discovering this place.
Michelin Star worthy burrata. Excellent attention to detail and very attentive staff. Otis is the Gem of Bushwick, I've been about 5 times and each experience has been consistently delightful.
Top notch food. Definitely worth the wait.
Ad says you serve late night food... you stop serving food at 11pm 🙄😡
Great food
Stumbled in on a cold day, and happy to discover this delicious new neighborhood staple
Food is so delicious!  Bartenders offered fabulous service too.
Great atmosphere. The boneless fish and a lot of bones, but other than that, great place to go!
pretty cool spot - you sit down at tables and people walk up to you and then you can order food from them. super neat concept!
Great staff. Great food. Great ambiance.
Hands down my favorite restaurant in Brooklyn. Scott and Michelle are the best and the food and drinks are amazing. GET THE BURATTA.

Been Twice so far and this place is such a gem.  the food is absolutely spectacular AND consistent.  Fantastic creative cocktails.  great friendly service!  really great for groups.  Tables for 2 are seated around the kitchen and are first come/first serve.  On our last visit our cocktails took a little long due to a slammed bar and they comped our dessert which was SO thoughtful and unexpected!  Looking forward to returning again soon!!  ps-yes get the burrata, its as good as everyone says it is!
I’ve been to Otis many times, my favorite restaurant of all times! The most amazing burrata!! And cocktails in town. My fiancé and I love it!!!

Great experience! The restaurant and the ambience is super gorgeous, it is the first time for me and my friends and nothing was disappointing. Simple menù good portions and unique flavor. The staff is very kind. Definitely come back 👍

(Translated by Google) Finally an excellent place to eat. Super clean, top staff, and awesome kitchen! I'll be back soon!  (Original) Finalmente un posto eccellente in cui mangiare. Super pulito, personale top, e cucina da urlo! Tornerò prestissimo!
One of my faves! Great food, great service

I’ve been here twice, the first time was spot on and one of the best meals we’ve (boyfriend eats meat and I’m veg) had in awhile but the second time was disappointed. Hopefully was just an off night, will have to go back a third time to try again
Overpriced. Not bad food
Atomosphere was pleasant and staffs were  kind and functional. Superb eating place. I would recommend to anybody with full confidence. Thanks guys! I will be back for more!!!!

Great food. This restaurant requires patience for seating. The food is absolutely phenomenal but service can take a while based on how busy they were. It took 2 hours total from seating to the end of dessert. Order drinks early! It made all the difference ;)
Great food! Amazing cocktails, really nice staff and the owners are great people.
Comfortable

The place is  very crowded, but the hostess. And the wait staff ensure that u know that u r not forgotten at all. I had the lamb shank and cous cous with herb salad. My son had the Rainbow trout and his girlfriend had pork noodles. We all agreed the dishes wee delish. The drinks were singular they had herbs and seasonings in it. I saw the red drink several times while I was there. Perhaps I will try that next time. If only I asked what it was called.

I think a fair review would be a 3.5! The ambiance was great, it’s a very hip/trendy spot tasty drinks! I was a little disappointed with the food, I ordered the pork shoulder pasta- which was just OK. Heirloom carrot is very yummy! I wouldn’t bother with dessert either. Overall The restaurant has a good vibe but not worth all the hype.
Exceptional place to grab some food when in a hurry. The customer service is rapid, prices are convenient, awesome vibes. Would recommend to others

I was skeptical of the five stars but am a believer after having dinner at Otis tonight. Our waiter was fantastic and very helpful in guiding us through our fabulous selections. The cocktails were delicious as well as every dish. We are already looking forward to our next visit!
Perhaps the BEST restaurant in Bushwick / East Williamsburg.
Amazing food. Great selection of drinks too

I sent my friends to this restaurant with my warmest recommendations. I visit this restaurant often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The meals are fantastic and the crew is very friendly and cooperative. Whenever we eat in this place we have a cheerful evening.  highly recommended.
(Translated by Google) Relaxing  (Original) Rilassante
Outstanding! Stop thinking about and just go. You won't be sorry. Get the burrata with pesto and tomato jam. The broth with the mussels are the best I've ever had by day.
This place is absolutely amazing!! The food is spectacular and the service is great!!!!!!!! Get the short rib pasta!
Shared the mussels and pork shoulder pasta - both amazing! Affordable wine bottles as well. Service was fantastic. Nice ambience

One of the best food and drink experiences I've had!! If you seek out interesting, flavorful food and drinks, Otis is one of the best. My friend and I sat at the beautiful, long bar and I stared at the wall full of spirits -- a vast selection of pretty much everything! The space is airy and open, in a warm, inviting room. The atmosphere is vibrant and fun. Service was excellent, prompt and a team effort. We felt very well taken care of. We ordered the beets, burrata and the market fish. The food came out quickly and the flavors in each dish were fantastic! I sipped on the perfect rum cocktail, Hawley Atcha Boy - Doctor Bird Rum, Plantation O.F.T.D., Overproof Rum, Avua Cachaça, toasted coconut, ginger, pineapple, lime, basil oil. We finished our meal and split the espresso martini. Not the typical drink for me, but this espresso martini was extremely delicious and the cold brew was strong! This drink satisfied our sweet tooth craving! We had no expectations before our first visit, but it was such a stellar experience, when we left we were already talking about going back. Pretty much a fan of Otis and suggest it to everyone!!
The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming (not an easy feat with high ceilings) Incredible food and lovely, knowledgeable  staff!
(Translated by Google) No comment  (Original) Sin comentarios
I can’t talk enough about this place. Everything here is soooo good. Service is outstanding. I can’t recommend one thing. I think you just have to try everything here. And Great cocktails!
Amazing food. Great Service.
Always great for food and cocktails.  Awesome service, chill vibe.   On par with any top Manhattan restaurant without any of the pretense!
Best restaurant in BK
Incredible food, amazing drinks. A local gem.

The reviews are true. Repeat chance: 100% There's an obvious joy for flavor and attention to experience crafted into every plate, bowl and glass. Start with the burrata, select an inhouse cocktail and venture into the rest of the menu. You'll be pleased enough to return at your next opportunity.
Great food and nice service
Amazing drinks, amazing food, amazing service!  Would definitely return whenever I'm in Brooklyn!
Fantastic food and atmosphere. Prices very reasonable for the high quality. Owner is present and friendly. Absolutely a must if spending time in brooklyn
Five star food.  Five star chef  owner and service.  All around great place.

Amazing dinner the ambience is really nice and relaxing and awesome vibe. The service was great. We got the bread spread which was delicious. The carrot appetizer which was out of this world, even my boyfriend loved it! The pork and duck entrées were phenomenal.

What a wonderful time here. Well our dinner is on a Tuesday night and most tables are pretty empty but the service is still 100%.  Let's start with the ambiance. I love the decro with expose wall and just the right amount of lighting. We had a romantic dinner while our waiter only drop by a few time to make sure we have the water. Most people I saw are single diners at the bar and that is the best spot.  They have a happy hour bar only special. With a few dollar off, you can get mussel and a drink. Menu is pretty decent but ends around 7pm.  Our food is amazing. We had the bread spread due to overwhelmed recommendation on other yelp reviews along with another dish. I went with the lamb for entree and it exploded in my mouth. I think it's probably better or comparable with all the high end spots. Well this place should be rated even higher if possible.  This is definitely a spot to impress.
Great food and friendly service.

Our meal at Otis was an incredible experience. We came in on a Wednesday, and received prompt, warm, and attentive service by the host and staff. Our server gave a helpful framework to understand their succinct menu, where each dish was a powerhouse of flavor and delivered with exceptional presentation. We ordered the burrata with squash and tomato jam, the green beans (nearing the end of season, which were incredible), the soup of the day which was a luscious tomato basil, and the mussels which came in an incredible broth and delicious bread. We left the meal happy and satisfied, and we're excited at the prospect of returning to taste their seasonally-changing menu.
VERY small menu but everything is beyond delicious. You can see the food being made in front of you if you sit at the bar & their drinks are all very unique and strong (in a good way!)
The food was Soo good OMG
Good portions for well crafted plates. Worthy of its high rating.
Good Food
One of the best dining experiences I've ever had. Incredible food, flawless service + great atmosphere. Shoutout to our server , Aaron, for making our dinner extra special ! We'll be back !
One of the best restaurant I had in NYC. In an unexpected place, among lot of industrial places , you have this culinary pearl. Highly recommend

I enjoyed everything about this place.  The food was unbelievable.  First rate , the staff was friendly .   knowledgeable about the food ,and helpful.  This was my first time at Otis it will not be my last I would highly recommend this place to all my friends.  The prices were reasonable. .  This place will become your go to place once you have eaten there.  Chef  Paul is without a doubt a rising star.  Bravo. I can't wait to go back and try everything on the menu.

I celebrated my graduation this evening in this excellent restaurant. I am glad to say that it was a pleasant evening and the restaurant was evidently one of the reasons for the successful evening. The waiters  helped in a gorgeous style, the cuisine was extremely good and my guests were extremely  glad. We shall absolutely return for more joyful events. thanks very much.
Great food
Pizza restaurant but with no pizza 9:30 at night

I have to admit, I think most brunch place's are a waste of time and money. They serve the cheapest meal of the day at ridiculous prices and rarely offer up anything unique, let alone salt their food. This place stood out. I ordered beef hash with acorn squash. This wasn't undercook potato cubes mixed with tool little beef. This was a generous portion of flavorful brisket served on top of a beautiful and crispy rösti (think of it as a hash brown pancake). They hit all the right notes; the textures of the beef and potatoes, the savory brisket, the sweet and acidic puree of the fruity sauce, and the pure spirit of fall the acorn squash adds both in flavor and visually. Every staff member was incredibly cheerful and inviting, and the interior was stylish without being uninviting. I definitely recommend this as one of the few brunch places I felt met my expectations.
Excellent food, service and cocktails, will certainly be back.

Let me sing the praises of this Bushwick sleeper hit. I recently turned to Otis to host a birthday dinner for my boyfriend when our original reservation fell through the night before. They accommodated six with grace and a lot of very delicious food. A picky crowd was happy from appetizer (burrata....you gotta) to main course (the entire table dipped garlic bread into mussel broth) and dessert (we brought that from home...they didn't charge a plating fee---even served us ice cream). The service was kind. The food was great. The prices were agreeable. Go on a date, a special occasion, or just to treat yourself. Highly recommend.
Great food and drinks, really good taste with a nice creative touch. Best dinner of our stay at affordable prices and with a friendly service.

This restaurant is my number one restaurant.  Of all restaurants I know I favor it most. I always suggests to my friends to go to this restaurant. everytime  I want to go to a superb lunchon, this restaurant comes right away to my mind. outstanding and many types of  food and a large list of dishes.trained team, and great mood. Also important, the tariff is good. I tell about this restaurant with great pleasure.

I went here for brunch and I was very impressed with the food. Their Beef Hash is especially good. I would highly recommend this place to anyone in the Bushwick area looking for a great place for food and drinks. Go here.

When visiting my son we always go to Otis.  It has a great atmosphere, the food is amazing and the staff is great.  Make sure and do family style and if you get a chance, do the Chef's table, you won't regret it!

Wow. So good. So worth 5 stars and the trip to Brooklyn.. it’s no wonder they have nearly perfect review. A very cute interior decor, great staff, food presentation, and delicious! Not pictured was the spicy chicken, which was also great.
Always delicious, good for a drink, a meal or both. Service is amazing, but it's busy, for good reason.
Try the fish.
Best dinner place in NY so far

One of Bushwicks best up and coming restaurants. Great menu and direction by Scott. Truly a breathtaking and culminating experience everytime we have dined at Otis.  Would go back every weekend if I could. These are the restaurants that make you want to open a restaurant. Scott makes it look easy.
Brunch was fantastic

"I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times." -Bruce Lee  My wife and I visited Otis for our wedding anniversary. I chose the place and had her in mind. Being plant-based myself, their menu isn't really tailored toward my lifestlye. However, I will say they did a great job of making adjustments where they could. My wife on the other hand was head over heals with her lamb dish and eyeing every other dish that came out as well. The menu may be small by conventional standards, but they have most definitely perfected it.  In short, the food was great, the vibe was right, so go visit Otis...it'll make your night.

The place is very laid back and mostly a bar with a small restaurant in the back , they have great selection of spirits and their cocktails are great I did not get food at this time ,  the bartender was super friendly and engaging I will come back to taste the food
Great staff and great food
Great service

The restaurant has a great vibe and the food is good. I was impressed the first time I went, underwhelmed the second time. I think you'll enjoy your dinner there, but it's not "clean" food. It's quite oily and it doesn't seem like they're using the highest quality food out there.
Amazing food and cocktails.
Ok standard Brooklyn brunch spot!
Excellent food, drinks and service.

Wasn’t sure what to expect prior walking in. Was presently surprised to find an airy, skylit interior with plenty of bar seating and an open kitchen. Our server was great and made the whole experience super fun. Tried three or four different items and each dish was more delicious than the last! Honestly Otis instantly became one of my favorite spots in Brooklyn, if not in all of New York. Will definitely be back.
Great find in Bushwick. Delicious food - we had burrrata, duck, lamb chops and beef dishes - very cool bar and lounge area and the wait staff were attentive, energetic...and fun!

I forgot to take a picture of the food but let's just say that I saw a whole garlic heads worth in my dish and holy cow. Worth every penny! The staff was amazing, the cocktails are super dope and the food is off the hook! 5/5 highly recommend for a date - they take reservations!

Any restaurant that's willing to put their kitchen out in the open deserves kudos for having confidence in their staff and product. The space has a very nice mid-century modern rustic/industrial feel to it, with skylights to fill the back seating area with a light and airy atmosphere. I've only been for brunch so far, but it was very good, though sitting at the kitchen counter makes you regret whatever you order because every other order you see being plated looks so enticing. Great spot for a casual date or small group of friends. Will definitely return.
We tried 3 dishes and they were all amazing. The cocktails were also on point. The place is beautiful and sunny. Def going back.
You must have brunch here; drinks are really good and the cinnamon rolls are epic. The most delicious cinnamon rolls ever!
Amazing food and super nice staff. We came right before kitchen closes and was able to get a full dinner order in. Delish.
Food and cocktail is amazing!
Brunch was amazing. Great service, food and drinks were delicious. I got the beef hash and a Bloody Mary. Will be back!
I. Love. Otis. Have been here every time of day and have yet to be disappointed by the menu. Drinks here are amazing and the food leaves nothing else to be desired....except maybe more food.
Phenomenal food, drinks, and service
OUTSTANDING FOOD, literally mind blowing. Such a perfect date spot, the lighting is low and food is the perfect portions and just delicious. ten billion stars, highly recommend.
Criminally superb. The rare perfect score.
Best pork shoulder pasta in town
Amazing brunch spot out in Bushwick.  Easy to get to - less than a block away from the Morgan Ave L stop.  Bright, airy interior, food is excellent, I recommend the cinnamon bun to share.
The Best Barrata ever!!!! Hands down!! Had to go 2 days in a row for that. I would have gone 3 days in a row but i had to fly back home to Florida.
Great service, fun cocktails, and delicious food

Great  place to drink and laugh have a good time font think about work for a few hours just you get things of the mind ain't nothing like dome hot spicy hot wings and a big glass bottle of what ever to drink friendly people to be around after hours or when ever you want to go there have fun peace thanks for reading my post

I’ve ordered something new from the menu every time I come. Every time, it reaches a new level of delicious I didn’t know was possible. Awesome food, especially if you like your food full of flavor and even a little bit spicy!
Great cocktails bar for a date. Nice decor great drinks, friendly bartenders.

Otis is, without a doubt, the best new restaurant I’ve tried in the past year and arguably one of the Top 4 or 5 restaurants in which I’ve ever eaten.  Everything was superlative.  The burrata (with pesto, tomato jam, and sweet potato), beet salad (with whipped ricotta, candied hazlenuts), lamb chops, duck leg, homemade foccacia were each one of the best examples of those dishes that I’ve ever tried in the US or Europe.  We’re heading back to Otis this weekend for a second visit.  Otis marries the quality and refinement of a Michelin-starred restaurant with generous quantities ideal for sharing, a laid-back, family vibe, beyond fair pricing, an awesome industrial chic decor, and just really great juju.  So glad that we found Scott, Paul, and this entire talented and caring team.
A special place
Excellent recipes.  Bursted with flavor.  Great creations...  A+

This is a restaurant firing on all cylinders. The food was good from start to finish and the service was even better. The staff handled special requests with aplomb and a smile. Cocktails were well done. The bread plate is a little bit lofty for what you get but otherwise I found this to be a very nicely executed experience in a very nicely decorated and good-feeling space
The food is good enough to serve at The Last Supper.

Oh nahhh! This place is legit. Wine list was good, cocktails are great and seasonal. Professionalism was off the charts. Food was flavorful AF, tasted all the elements in the dishes. I went with a group of 3, it’s worth any wait time. We had the breads and spreads, beet with ricotta salad, trout, lamb shank, duck confit, and berry crumble. Staff was knowledgeable and accommodating. Lauren was our server, she’s amazing!
No take out. But good food

Otis is by far my favourite restaurant in Brooklyn. The food is flawless (get the burrata!), the service is perfect, and the atmosphere is perfect for every occasion, from date night to catching up with a friend to solo dining. I wish it weren’t so far out of the way because I’d be there every night if it were in Manhattan.
Incredible food and brilliant service! Highly recommend checking Otis out! The burrata as an appetizer is the best.
Everything I've eaten here has been fantastic - and every cocktail I've drunk, too! Cannot recommend highly enough.
Love love love this place! Amazing ambiance, knowledgeable fun courteous staff and equally delish food to boot. Great discovery. Will def come back.
I really enjoyed this place:  the ambiance was like being a beautiful apartment with lots of plants, food was very good and fresh and the drinks were tasty and creative. Would definitely recommend!
Hands down best restaurant in all of New York City! everything on the menu is delicious, starting from drinks to dessert!
Everything from food and drinks was amazing
Good food, drinks and vibe
Amazing cocktails and amazing food. Lovely atmosphere! will definitely go back!

We went there for a surprise birthday but it was also a surprise for us to find such good food! Nothing especially fancy but just really great mixes of ingredients and flavours. The ice cream desserts in particular were so decadent! Definitely on the come-back list.

Amazing restaurant. The service is phenomenal, drinks are creative and good. This is elevated comfort cuisine at its finest. Non-pretentious, hipster, and delicious. So creative - definitely will be back.

Otis is one of these places that makes you feel like home. Delicious food and more than an excellent service. The bread is home made and is actually pretty good! Went for the pork shoulder and I don’t regret it. Great cocktails too. Probably the best restaurant in Bushwick/East Williamsburg at the moment.
Delicious food and excelent service. It's always a pleasure to come here. Also, best cinnamon rolls ever!
The food is amazing, awesome staff. Drinks are good. Menus a bit short but everything on it is 5 out of 5.
I really liked the lamb shank and the pork shoulder past. Will definitely be back!
Amazing food, fabulous wine list, great friendly service. Now one of my New York little secrets I'm happy to share with everyone.
Best food I’ve eaten as of late.
Loved this place.
Best meal I've ever had in NYC!
Have dined here twice and I tell everyone about this place . Amazing service , delicious food , great atmosphere. I absolutely love this place !
Overall a really nice spot for quality mixed cocktails (a touch sweet on the classic whiskey cocktails) and beers. Will be back for food.
Fantastic food and such a beautiful space. Everything we ate was perfect. It seems as if they have just started doing brunch and they are already nailing it. Can't wait to be back.

Services were above and beyond. Food were very well prepared and delicious. Buchetta was seriously amazing which were served with warm-and-tender bread. We almost ordered everything in the menu and there were no disappointed ones.
Came highly recommended by our AirBNB host, and did not dissapoint! So good, we went back the following night. Great vibe, great staff and really, really good food.

(Translated by Google) The best restaurant in New York during our weekend. Nice atmosphere, excellent service and wonderful meal. Thank you to the hosts.  (Original) Le meilleur restaurant de New York durant notre week-end.  Belle ambiance, service excellent et repas magnifique.  Merci aux hôtes.

Best service I’ve had since I moved to NY. They were very busy but we were squeezed in last minute; the staff was honestly the most genuine, friendliest staff I’ve encountered since moving here and it was so refreshing. The food was absolutely delicious, beautiful and everything was made fresh right there. We’ve lived a block away for a year and a half and I’m wishing we would have found Otis sooner! I’ve never written a review but after leaving I felt inclined to. Thank you to the great staff, welcoming atmosphere, amazing food and overall a great after work date night. Will definitely be back!
Truly amazing dining experience.  Visiting from Miami and found this gem in Brooklyn,  wow!!!
Simply the best! Food here is insanly good!!!
Very good food...very flavorful
Best restaurants in Bushwick hands down. Eyes closed

We are from Toronto and visited Otis on a friend's recommendation. It was one of the best dining experiences ever for our party of five. The service was friendly and comfortable from the minute we entered the restaurant. We tried all of the specialty drinks except the Bastille Bagel :( (they were out). The drinks were delicious and fun. There is a good mix to appeal to different tastes.  We shared plates so we could each enjoy all of the dishes. We ordered A LOT of food. The server talked us out of a couple of dishes because we clearly over ordered. I am not exaggerating, EVERY DISH WAS DELICIOUS. It was tough to pick favourites. We tried all of the appetizers and most of the entrees. The buratta was a group favourite. The roasted beets and charred cauliflower were my personal favorites. Of the entrees, the shell fish lovers raved about about the mussels (some of us aren't fans but couldn't resist the sauce for dipping).   We couldn't get enough of the homemade bread. I LOVED the short ribs. The duck and pork shoulder pasta were faves of others.  Do yourself a favour and go with a group so you can experience as many dishes as possible and make sure to order the desserts - they were the perfect ending. There are only two so you don't have to wrestle with decisions. Our meal was a religious experience. We will be back on our next visit to NYC. Thank you Otis!

I frequent this place (although I feel guilty having not dined in some time) but wanted to express how incredible the food and service are! I leave OTIS completely stuffed every time I come here. This is the perfect place for a 1on1 meet, group dining or solo cocktail and light bite venture. Highly recommend OTIS! I will be back soon!!
The buratta was amazing!  Classy staff.  My buddy ordered a beer and they served it 3/4 full because the keg ran out... they comped the beer!  Love these guys :)
Fantastic unassuming restaurant!

Absolutely LOVE this place. Went first for drinks, was so impressed by their craft cocktails and then came back a few weeks later for dinner and was even more satisfied. The staff was helpful and extremely friendly. Definitely a staple restaurant for me!

Every drink and item I ordered off the menu was absolutely splendid. Best burrata I’ve ever had. The staff and owner were all so kind; I felt so welcomed. Will be making this a routine  restaurant to visit.
My favorite joint I'm the hood. Great dishes, come try the borata.
Best restaurant in bushwick with the most phenomenal wait staff ive ever encountered. Mind blown.
The buratta was amazing! Had great wine, pasta, and soup. Recommended Otis to multiple friends the day after our dinner. Can’t wait to go back.
Amazing cocktails, amazing food. Had the Interlude cocktail and the duck leg. Great vibe too, will be back.

Excellent food in a great atmosphere with excellent service. In NY there are a plethora of overcrowded restaurants with subpar food and service. This place bucks the trend and truly sets a new standard. Every meal we ordered was excellent and despite some seemingly small sizes it was very filling.
Beautiful spot
The best ribs ever !! Delicious break!!! Great drinks !! And super nice and friendly staff!! This is a must go place !!!

We were headed to our favorite spot in Williamsburg when my hubby threw in a curve ball. Let's try this place OTIS he says it looks good . . .uhmmm  . . .he has never steered us wrong and has such a good compass for great places . . . so we change course with zero regrets.  What an A-Mazing find.  The ambience was grand and cosy with a huge well stocked bar with amazing cocktails and the coolest nicest staff you have ever met. We were seated at the chef's table - where you see all the majic happen - and what majic it is!  Everything we ordered was scrumptious from the corn soup, the BURRATA with sweet potato puree and tomato jam and a pesto so gooooood, to the succulent mussels and tender lambchops. Did I mention they make their own bread which they toast on the grill and was the perfect vehicle to soak up everything from the creamy burrata to the mussel sauce. The food was so well balanced, flavorful and had the perfect char from the grill. While I generally like my food more assertive - everything we ate far exceeded every taste and texture expectation and I would not change a single thing.  Last thing, the portions are really big and the food is very reasonably priced. . . and if you have room (or even if you don't) do yourself a favor and have the dessert anyway. The death by chocolate (brownie bites with chocolate gelato and salted caramel sauce and toasted almonds ohhh and fresh cherries . . . OMG) was the perfect ending to the perfect date night.  Thank you to my perfect Hubby and OTIS for a memorable experience. Charlie, Chef Paul and Chef/ Owner Scott - we WILL be back!

My favorite restaurant, no questions asked. You have to come here to understand why this is a 4.9 restaurant. Each dish is a piece of art. Burrata simply melts in your mouth and the accompanying sauces add to the heaven. Cocktails have a very complex but at the same time simple texture and two of my favorite ones are Surfboard and Bastille Bagel. The ambiance of the atmosphere is rare to come across and the service is excellent with all of the employees trying to make sure you get the best experience. I am definitely coming back to this place!

If they do something wrong, I didn't find it. Excellent food. Good ambiance. Great service. This is worth going out of your way for! We had their breads, dips, spätzle, lamb, ribs, and fish of the day. Everyone in our party of 7 walked away raving about the food and service.
Unbelievably amazing food. Great mood, great music. Awesome place.
Amazing amazing food! Best I've had in very long time!

A much-needed culinary gem in Bushwick. Great service coupled with fresh and creatively delicious food. Equally good for dates and hanging with friends. You MUST try the burrata appetizer!  Lastly, the bar by itself is a perfect spot to hang too.

The food, ambiance, service and transparency is one of a kind at Otis. The chefs can be seen cooking every dish in the open kitchen setting. My wife and I had every vegetable dish over two nights. My favorites were the burratta and the Romain Salad. We also ordered the mussels and ribs. The food is excellently seasoned, unique and affordable. One of the best restaurants in Brooklyn! Great cocktails too!

Otis is such an amazing place. We loved it so much, we ate there two nights in a row. The food is unreal. Everything literally melts in your mouth. Between the two nights, we ordered all the vegetable dishes and the mussels and ribs. Every single thing we had was delicious. Beyond the food, the environment is so cozy and cool. You can tell that the owners put great care into creating such a wonderful place. The chef is outstanding and truly passionate about his craft. It has an open kitchen so you get to watch both of the chefs create the fresh, amazing food. The cocktails are also outstanding. Lauren is a great bartender. She is so sweet and really knowledgeable. Highly recommend this incredible restaurant.

This is a fantastic restaurant, probably the best in the area. It boasts a beautiful open kitchen where you can watch the chef work his magic. The layout is very nice with a relaxed but high end atmosphere, dark and cool. The food is simply fantastic from home made breads, soups, small veggie dishes and main courses primarily meat based. Cocktails are creative and delicious, plus the wine list is quality. Staff are all super cool and professional. Definitely highly recommended.

(Translated by Google) Very good restaurant. The dishes are very rich and well presented. The attention is very good although a little messy. The place is very nice in an area that is growing in New York. A good surprise.  (Original) Muy buen restaurante. Los platos son muy ricos y están muy bien presentados. La atención es muy buena aunque un poco desordenada. El lugar es muy bonito en una zona que está creciendo en Nueva York. Una buena sorpresa.
Delicious food with very friendly service. Owner conversed while cooking and encouraged sharing food. Overall was a fantastic experience along with an amazing atmosphere
Best food and cocktails aroind
I thought about selfishly writing a bad review to keep people away from this incredible gem of perfection. Ambiance, food, servers, etc. I'm addicted

I invited some British colleagues to Otis earlier this week. They thought this cool New York! Food was beautifully prepared and delicious. Service was excellent and the atmosphere buzzing. The street art to be seen on the drive to and from was a bonus.

I just had a prix fixe dinner Of at least 7 courses at Otis that was among the top five meals I’ve had in my entire life. Astonishingly good for an incredibly reasonable price, with outstanding service great vibes and dope music. BRAVO.

Otis feels cozy and welcoming, and anything you order will be more interesting and delicious than you expect. It's food worth dwelling on, and talking about later, and recommending to everyone you know.  The owner and chef, in addition to being crazy talented, is friendly and happy to talk about what he's making. Sit at the counter by the kitchen!  And order the bread. Always order the bread.
Yum yum yum and more yum! The burrata and pork pasta are SO delicious! I’ve eaten many restaurants in New York and this is now my fav!

(Translated by Google) I recommend this restaurant and the Bushwick area 1000%. If you are looking for something different than Manhattan, you have the perfect place! Hypster district and the Otis restaurant: Simply a big wow!  Chef Scott is a magician! We were very well received and the atmosphere in the restaurant is incredible! The food is simply indescribable at a reasonable price.  The Bushwick district is sure to become a must-see when traveling to New York in a few years. To discover immediately without fail !!  (Original) Je recommande ce restaurant et le quartier Bushwick à 1000 %. Si vous chercher quelque chose de différent que Manhattan, vous avez la place par excellence! Quartier hypster et le restaurant Otis : Simplement un gros wow !  Le chef Scott est un magicien ! Nous avons été super bien reçu et l’ambiance du resto est incroyable! La nourriture est tout simplement indescriptible à un prix raisonnable.  Le quartier Bushwick deviendra assurément un incontournable lors des voyages à New York dans quelques années. A découvrir immédiatement sans faute !!
You’d better go now because sooner than later you won’t be able to get a seat. Deeeeeeelish.
Delicious food, love the open kitchen environment, friendly service
Amazing whiskey sour and bordeaux, super tasty burrata, incredibly addictive pork pasta. The lady loved the kale salad, the best ever :D and the way natural light spills in. Beautiful!
Superb cocktails, finger licking food. Love the open kitchen and spacious bar!

Excellent little spot off of the Morgan Ave stop. The food is incredible and very reasonably priced. The menu is small but well-curated and growing. The owner is often working in the kitchen and eager to hear your thoughts on your meal. Highly recommend the miso pork shoulder!

I found Otis accidentally when an artist friend made it the after-party spot for her art opening in the nabe. Serendipitous. This is my kind of place, from the music to the food. And a staff that so obviously understands those things and what hospitality is. This was a late night dinner, so we only tried a few dishes - all great. The cheese plate, the lamb shank, and the chicken thighs.  Scott, the chef (who’s super-friendly), is a magician with taste profiles, throwing flavor combinations at you that pop, and surprise. Not a surprise given his pedigree at EMP. I am making a reservation to go back with friends on Friday for a more complete dinner and maybe a real, food blog review.
Outstanding comfort food. You have to try the pork shoulder pasta. Each bite was heavenly 🤩
Amazing food, people and ambience. It's the true definition of comfort food that's impeccably prepared and presented. Would definitely come back the next time I visit NY and Brooklyn again.

Trendy little spot. Very chill, friendly staff and knowledgeable bartenders. I was served a fine example of one of the best "Old Fashion" cocktails I've ever had. Made true to its original roots, with a Rye Whiskey and a history lesson to boot. Haven't tried the food yet but will be returning soon. Highly recommend for a date night or just a classy place to let your hipster flag wave.
Instant Bushwick favorite! Delicious food, excellent service, warm atmosphere.
Do not expect a large portion or any side at all. Very overpriced. Music and decor is good but unsatisfactory meal which ruined the night, please stay away if you are hungry.

I'm still not sure why I have to order another food dish after an appetizer and entree order so I would just like to save other people the time. I appreciate the response but I was already unhappy with the meal and when i explained this to the server away from the dinning area, my meal was already over and I did not want to stay longer to wait for more food. Your response is appreciated and I'm not trying to be unreasonable but you expect some value for the prices that are paid, especially when there is such competition in the area. Maybe I am the only customer that feels this way but unless something could be done to remedy this issue, I will continue to state my experience as I believe I wont be the last one.
couldn’t be more impressed. happy to have them in the neighborhood!

this was really good. The burrata and sweet potato with pesto is excellent, new and pleasent combo for a cheese I've always enjoyed  Family style so you're meant to share, but unlike a tapas place the dishes are pretty sizeable. 4 people can get a good try of each one. They weren't "small plates" but served in that style, so it actually ends up being a pretty good price for a group and you won't leave hungry.  had a good waiter, staff managed to be friendly and enthusiastic but didn't pester, liked the inside, overall highly recommend. I will go back
Fantastic staff, low key atmosphere with great vibes, food is delicious!
Amaze.  Suuuuper tasty...beets....lamb shank ...you really can't go wrong!
Fantastic edition to the neighborhood
Amazing food. Great vibe. Great service.
Amazing meal start to finish. Great service, friendly. I can't recommend it enough. Will be back!
Gorgeous, warm atmosphere... delicious food, friendly staff and fantastic cocktails. Reasonably priced... love it. Welcome addition to the neighborhood ❤️
Go here. Order 1 of each (2 of the pasta).

One of my favorite places in all of Brooklyn. From the decor to the music to the food and the general Ambience of this place. I can't help but keep coming back. The food just keeps getting better and better. So excited the bar is finally open for full service, can't wait to enjoy some wonderfully crafted cocktails this coming summer.
The food is incredible and well-priced. Extremely friendly and fun staff. Pleasing decor.
Amazing food and great staff with a pleasant atmosphere

This is the spot of my dreams - from the decor, to the staff, to the food, everything is on point. Nothing on the menu is 'intimidating' but it's all so surprising and so special. This is such a gem for the neighborhood, and is so so SO worth it (even though the prices are incredibly reasonable).  Def aim to get the bread spread, but share so that you have space for the delicious entrees (pork shoulder all day).
Beautiful, calming space. Incredible food. Everything was of a surprising caliber - flavor and presentation. The carrots. The chicken. The BREAD.

Lovely lovely place to eat in Bushwick! I really can’t say enough good things about this restaurant! The Chef and waitor were super friendly, the food was amazing and the place is really pretty! Highly reccomend it! I will definitely come back soon!  Cheers!

Amazing, cozy spot in up and coming Bushwick neighborhood. It’s teally close to the train so even if you don’t live in Brooklyn it’s super easy to get to . It’s got a really homey yet modern vibe and I hear there’s an outdoor space (summer 2018!) . The food is modern American and slightly rustic. The staff and owner are really friendly ( he even cooks in the open kitchen) and helpful and everything is yummy . Price points are super affordable . I highly reccoment the beet salad and the chicken thigh! This is definitely a must go to. Once we get out of this frozen tundra this place is going to be slammed.
Bomb food, great prices. Get in while its still byob and not mobbed.

WOW!!! What a find! I will be a regular at this gem. The food is really delicious. I was impressed. Everything is obviously made with the best ingredients and creativity. The dishes are plated beautifully, very instagramable, if that's your thing. The staff are friendly and fun. I was treated like an old friend. Service was wonderful. The prices were wonderful.The ambiance and decor are spectacular! This place is really gorgeous inside. The location in Bushwick is fun and quite convenient as it is just a half block walk from the Morgan stop on L line. Just GO!

Amazing expiernce! Ate here a couple of weeks ago with my friend and sat at the beautiful chefs table. Every dish was spot on, flavor and presentation. The chef is a super friendly and so is all of the staff. This gem is about the change the food game in Morgan town!  P.S. Super affordable!

Had a lovely experience with friends. The chef and waitress were very accommodating and personable. I really enjoyed the bread plate and chicken dish, both of which had great presentation and taste. Definitely will visit again!
This is a hidden treasure. Worth the trip to Bushwick for the small plates, awesome decor and ambience and the great hospitality. Looking forward to coming back.
Everything I ate here was absolutely delicious, look forward to returning.

Just had the BEST tasting menu with an amazing chef! This place is a MUST to come eat and enjoy delicious food, a beautiful atmosphere and thoughtfully prepared dishes. I honestly cannot say enough good things about this food. Next time you're in the hood you have to come by eat and be merry!
